USERSTORY: As an admin, I need to be able to add, delete and reorder nodes so I can manage the timeline.
TASKS: Implement linked list data structure to represent timeline.
Create add and delete functions. Nodes should be addable and deletable from any position in timeline.
Create function for reorder interaction, let admin choose a node and choose its new position, shifting existing nodes towards the end.

USERSTORY: As an admin, I need to be able to add and edit information for each node so I can manage each virtual exhibit.
TASKS:
Implement the linked list data structure to represent the virtual 
exhibit

Create add and delete functions. Nodes should be addable and 
deletable from any position in the virtual exhibit.

USERSTORY: As an admin, I need to be able to add and edit user accessible media within each node so I can manage what is displayed to users.
TASKS: Create a function to add and edit user media within each node.
create a function to manage what a user can and cannot see.

USERSTORY: As a user, I should be able to select a node in the timeline and be able to access the information and media within it.
TASKS: create a function to pick a specific node from the list.
create a function to access information within the node

USERSTORY: As a user, I should have an option to be toured through the timeline and guided through nodes.
TASKS:
create an function to move through the timeline with the help of 
nodes.
